author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students of Government Arts College, Tiruvannamalai, staged a demonstration on Friday demanding judicial probe into the death of three girl students of SVS Naturopathy and Yoga Science Medical College, Kallakkurichi in Villupuram district.

Students Federation of India (SFI) had organised the demonstration in front of Government Arts College here and Sathishkumar, district vice president of SFI led the protest.

Official apathy

They also demanded action against negligent officials whose apathy led to the death of students and to provide government job to one from the family of each of the three students.

SFI had organised

the demonstration

in front of Government Arts College
title: Students seek judicial probe into girls’ death
